column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Department of Investigation and Implementation Procedures announce on Friday
column6: that nine Chinese nationals (eight are pictured) have been charged with aggravated assault
column8: and criminal trespass.------They were named as------ 1- ZHAO YANG
column10: 3-MA JUNHUI  4-ZHANG JINGSHENG 5-WANG LIBING 6-HAN MO 7-MA GUO 8-LIU XIANGUO and 9-RUAN MINGBAO.------They will be expelled from Cambodia and sent back to China. ------PPR
